WorkItem.Description:
How to: Create a Solution Using the Composite Application Library
 
Step 4 reads 
 
"Open the App.xaml file, and then change the StartupUri attribute of the Application node from Window1.xaml to Shell.xaml, as shown in the following code."
 
Should be revised to read:
 
"Open the App.xaml file, and then remove the StartupUri attribute of the Application node, as shown in the following code."
 
Both the Application XAML and Bootstrapper (app constructor) are launching the Shell.
 
 
The following link at the bottom of the page resulted in my email being returned to me with a message to the affect that the user did not exist.
"To report documentation errors or provide feedback on this documentation, please send email to pagdoc@microsoft.com. "
WorkItem.Summary: Documentation - Creating solution opens two forms

Comments.Message:
Hi Bill,

The article in the documentation referring to how to create a solution using Prism has an additional step saying:

"Open the file App.xaml, and then remove the attribute StartupUri. This attribute is not required because you are manually instantiating the Shell window."

That should address the behavior you're mentioning about showing the shell twice.

Thank you for your feedback.

Guido Leandro Maliandi
http://blogs.southworks.net/gmaliandi
